concept.title: Installing on Windows
concept.shortdesc: How to install DITA Open Toolkit and its prerequisite software on Windows.

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p: Before installing DITA Open Toolkit and its prerequisite software on Windows, check to see if any of the tools are already installed on your system and, if so, whether the version you have is supported (see System requirements and supported applications). For any tools you need to install, complete the tasks below in the order shown.
